name: Minotaur Living Crystal Statue
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The statue makes two attacks: one with its greataxe and one gore attack.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Flying Shards
entries: In response to a creature hitting the statue with a melee weapon attack, the statue deals 11 ({@damage 2d10}) piercing damage to the attacker.
